about_the_game:
Electronic sounds of wizardry, outer space and sorcerer cats. Crafted to provide your ears with a magical ride of both dance and chill. Composed by Bogdan Rybak, 6 tracks included.

1. Play Ball (01:50)
2. Intergalactic (02:28)
3. Witching Hour (02:48)
4. Catnip (02:30)
5. Wiz Biz (02:23)
6. Arcane Arena (02:56)
